short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy aliased emails to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get unique aliased versions of your email address, quicker. Get unique aliased emails based on your own email address, updated by the second to ensure the aliased email you use is unique. A helpful tool for testers and developers to test unique email addresses.
Default alias is timestamp based. Add custom words into the aliased email for additional control.
